name: MumpsTestsForMumpsVirusNucleicAcid
title: Mumps (Tests for mumps virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mumps virus nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Mumps virus probe/ genotype;  LOINC search: "Mumps virus (probe or genotype) -panel"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
